body:
This is nice! Small merge conflict that needs to be resolved.

Re: cutting down the `ExecuteStatus` component, it would be nice if the switch case was just handling the inner text of the element. The only thing that's really changing about the element itself is the className on the icon. (class list includes `fa-circle` if the status is `executed`, otherwise it includes `fa-circle-thin`). You could do what you did with the `statusColor` variable and set a default `iconClass` variable to `fa-circle-thin`, then only change it under the `executed` case. Then you could at least move the span & icon elements down [here](https://github.com/mythmon/normandy/blob/c857575d9c98aa7539f3c96120cc4c3f6c8b854a/client/control/components/RecipePreview.js#L139). I don't know if it'll actually save you _lines_ of code, but it'll certainly cleanup some of the repeat.
